36#include "kadmin_locl.h"
37#include "kadmin-commands.h"
38
39static int
40do_del_entry(krb5_principal principal, void *data)
41{
42 return kadm5_delete_principal(kadm_handle, principal);
43}
44
45int
46del_entry(void *opt, int argc, char **argv)
47{
48 int i;
49 krb5_error_code ret = 0;
50
51 for(i = 0; i < argc; i++) {
52 ret = foreach_principal(argv[i], do_del_entry, "del", NULL);
53 if (ret)
54 break;
55 }
56 return ret != 0;
57}
58
